required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of F520 in Relapsed/Refractory Primary Central Nervous System Lymphoma (PCNSL) or Secondary Central Nervous System Lymphoma (SCNSL)
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2, Open-label, Single-arm, Multicenter Study of F520 in Relapsed/Refractory Primary Central Nervous System Lymphoma (PCNSL) or Secondary Central Nervous System Lymphoma (SCNSL)

lead_sponsor.agency: Shandong New Time Pharmaceutical Co., LTD

clinical_study.source: Shandong New Time Pharmaceutical Co., LTD

brief_summary.textblock: It is a multi-center, prospective, open-label, two-stage optimized design, single-arm, phase II clinical study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of F520 for the treatment of Relapsed/Refractory Primary Central Nervous System Lymphoma (PCNSL) or Secondary Central Nervous System Lymphoma (SCNSL).

primary_outcome.measure: Objective response rate (ORR) by Independent Review Committee (IRC) Independent Review Committee (IRC).
primary_outcome.description: Response assessment will be performed according to modified IPCG response. criteria on contrastenhanced cranial MRI-scans.

secondary_outcome.measure: Objective response rate (ORR) based on the investigator assessment.
secondary_outcome.description: Response assessment will be performed according to modified IPCG response.
Based on IRC and the investigator assessments.
Based on IRC and the investigator assessments.
AE/SAE will be assessed by CTCAE v5.0
